subtitle: Minced lamb or turkey can also be used in this recipe.

method.text: In a bowl mix together the salad onions, chicken, turmeric, cayenne pepper, chilli, seasoning.
Stir in the flour and eggs until well mixed. Cover and chill for at least 1 hour.

Pour enough of the oil into a pan or deep fat fryer to no more than <sup>2</sup>/<sub>3</sub> full. Heat until 180°C. Using two spoons, shape small quantities of the mixture into balls. Drop a few at a time into the hot fat.

Fry for 5 min or until crisp and well browned. Remove with a slotted spoon and drain well on kitchen towel. Repeat until all the fritter mixture is used up, while keeping the cooked fritters warm. Serve immediately.

title: Minced chicken fritters
